programme.title: Space: The New Frontier

programme.desc: As scientists peer more closely at nearby stars, they are discovering countless exo planets.

programme.desc: The new surge in space transportation, private entrepreneurs looking to build hotels in space.

programme.desc: Every day we use satellites, from communication and weather observation, to GPS and recourse management.

programme.title: Polar World
programme.desc: After the Arctic cold loosens its grip, polar bears emerge. Cubs are keen to explore their new surroundings.

programme.title: Exploring Venus
programme.desc: The surface of Venus is 95% carbon dioxide with an atmospheric pressure equivalent to 900 meters underwater.

programme.title: Exploring Venus

programme.desc: Enter a volcanic crater and go under the Earth to discover what makes erupting volcanoes so deadly.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Transportation accidents can endanger thousands in seconds. Can anything be done to minimize their damage?
